page.title: 17The Bell Inn at Monks Kirby
page.content: {The Bell Inn}is one of two public houses in the village the other being {The Denbigh.}The Landlord at the Bell sells a range of food such as bar snacks,grills and Sunday roasts.They make their own fruit pies but buy in other sweets such as gateaux.They sell Ruddles beer two different types of lager and sixteen different types of wine. {Lord Denbigh}opened the inn in{1970 which is when{Mr.and Mrs.Sutton}who own the inn first came here.The interior is made of oak wood and there are the remains of grave stones on the floor which probably came from the church or belltower which was on the site where the the Bell Inn now stands.
